9/ Show some courage.
8/ If you don't think he's coming for you in Congress, you're not paying attention.
7/ In the old days, you could expect this to happen. Congress standing up for its role as an equal branch. Today we can only hope.
6/ Tomorrow it will be the Congress. And if Congress doesn't stand up now, collectively, they will be too weak when he comes for you.
5/ Stood up and said, as an institution, that attacks on independent branches of govt are unacceptable. Today it's the judicial branch.
4/ Trump singles them out and takes them down on Twitter. It's easy, they are alone. What would happen if Congress stood up collectively?
3/ What happened during the campaign and since is that each time an individual stands up, whether Romney or Rubio, they do it alone.
2/ As sure as the sun rises, you can bet Trump will turn on the legislative branch and individual Rs as they do things he disagrees with.
1/ I remain beyond baffled by Republicans standing down as Trump attacks the pillars of democracy. Do they not think he'll turn on them?
